message.content: ADMTC is a service provider tasked with pedagogical services by the certifying organization. It represents the certifying organization at the national level for all partner centers and acts on behalf of and under the supervision of the certifying organization. Its mission includes supporting partner centers in implementing training for certification, coordinating the organization of assessments, and ensuring compliance with the rules governing certification and its preparation.
message.header_ref:
- ADMTC_1 > CHARTE DU CENTRE PARTENAIRE  > EVOLUTION ET FORME DES CONTROLES QUALITE

 - ADMTC_1 > CHARTE DU CENTRE PARTENAIRE  > LA PLATEFORME ADMTC.PRO 
 - ADMTC_1 > CHARTE DU CENTRE PARTENAIRE  > SOMMAIRE 
 - ADMTC_1 > CHARTE DU CENTRE PARTENAIRE  > ENQUETE D’EMPLOYABILITE

message.content: ADMTC is used to support partner centers in the implementation of training that prepares for certification, coordinate the organization of assessments, and ensure compliance with the rules governing certification and its preparation. It serves as the main point of contact for partner centers and facilitates communication and collaboration among various stakeholders involved in the certification process.
